content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple attempts were made to locate, craft, and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded due to resource shortages and placement failures. Although existing furnaces (e.g., one at (5.0, 5.0) and another at (–27.0, –60.0)) were utilized for smelting operations, they were not newly built by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Usage – When calling functions such as get_entities, avoid using unsupported keywords (for example, “radius”) or supplying an incorrect number of positional arguments. Always verify the API’s signature before use.
• Iterable Validations – Before iterating over the results of an API call, confirm that the returned value is indeed an iterable. Use a fallback (such as an empty list) to prevent “NoneType object is not iterable” errors.
• Lab Crafting and Placement – Prior to attempting Lab crafting or placement, ensure that all prerequisite ingredients (e.g., iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, copper-plate, copper-cable, electronic-circuit) are available. Verify that the supply chains (including necessary smelting operations) are active and double-check inventory for the intended Lab item before placement.
